page.title: 19EVENTS IN EAST COKER
page.content: Easr Coker has participated in many fund raising activities.Seven and a half years of hard work paid off this year with{opening of the new village {hall. All the loans have now been cleared. The school PTA worked hard and with the support of the village through fetes etc. has refurbished and opened a{swimming pool}for the primary school. An{Open Gardens Day}raised Â£620 for St. Michael'S church restoration fund, even though it rained all day. Coffee, Ploughmen's lunches and cream teas were sold at three different houses. This year the village has joined the county's celebrations commemorating the Battle of Sedgemoor with a{street {Fayre}and,in the evening,a barbecue. This year is also the{Golden {Anniversary of the village Flower Show
